name: Janko-navo
description:
Recoil-based controls. You move to shoot, and you shoot to move.

You're the only non-Esperanto speaker left. It is out of principle: you come from a long line of proud Ido hipsters, for whom Esperanto is too mainstream.

Today, it finally happened. They found your hiding spot, at the end of the universe. The esperantizing Melonoj start coming. You hop into your Janko-ship; it is a futile resistance, but you still have to do it...

Controls:

  • Arrow keys or D-pad: move (and shoot).

 With every shot, you move a little in the opposite direction.

You can also move diagonally.

This game was made for the Ludum Dare 50.

The game jam theme is "Delay the inevitable".

If you'd like to actually learn Esperanto, check my website: jamtempisto.com
